SSG_Tools.Fonts
Class FileStrokeFont

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.Fonts.StrokeFont
      SSG_Tools.Fonts.FileStrokeFont

public class FileStrokeFont
extends StrokeFont

A FileStrokeFont object loads the low-level font data from a file containing the "Hershey Fonts". This class reads the font data from from one of the text files: cyrilc.txf, gothitt.txf, italicc.txf, romand.txf, scriptc.txf, gothgbt.txf, greekc.txf, italict.txf, romans.txf, scripts.txf, gothgrt.txf, greeks.txf, romanc.txf or romant.txf that hold a simple textual form of the Hershey font data.

Constructor Summary
FileStrokeFont(java.lang.String file_name)
          Construct a StrokeFont object by reading the data from the specified file.
 
Method Summary
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          The main method in this class loads a Hershey font from a text file of the form *.txf, and writes a java source file for a font class extending StrokeFont.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method in this class loads a Hershey font from a text file of the form *.txf, and writes a java source file for a font class extending StrokeFont.

Parameters:
args - The list of parameters, including the fully qualified font file name (eg: romans.txf), the output path and the name of the font class to be created (eg: RomanSimplex). If the font class source file is not in the package .../GL_ThreeD/Fonts, the package statement will need to be altered.
